ygData.subject: New Druid
ygData.msgSnippet: Well I entered EQ today and create 3 characters, one of which is a WE Druid named Legludar.He is in Greater Faydark, whereever that is. He gave his note to the
ygData.messageBody:
Well I entered EQ today and create 3 characters,
one of which is a WE Druid named Legludar.He is in
Greater Faydark, whereever that is. He gave his note to
the Heartwood Master who told him to prove his
loyalty by bringing him a rusty short sword, a rusty
longsword, a rusty bastard sword and a rusty broad sword.
Where do I get these things (he wants to destroy them
and reward me) and where is Greater Faydark? Iam on
Bertoxxolus.
